name: Word Grill
description:
The ultimate word find, search, and slide game designed for the iPad and iPhone!
Slide rows and columns to build words. Touch and hold a letter to make it's word dissapear for points. If that letter is in 2 words you get a multiplier for future use!

Each level has a different letter distribution, so you can exercise a different part of your vocabulary. It's a real brain teaser of a game that will keep you having fun for hours.
